participant_1.background:
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself.
I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time.
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
my parents are still married.

participant_2.background:
I had a small party with my friends.
i love to go horseback riding.
i work for a beer distributor.
I've been in the best shape of my life thanks to regular exercise.
i like to make bagels.

content.text: Hi, I'm [name]! How are you today?
Hello [name], I'm doing well. Thanks for asking!
Great to hear that! How was your weekend?
My weekend was good! I had a small party with my friends. How was yours?
My weekend was great too! I got my nails done and read my favorite comic books.
That sounds like a relaxing weekend! What kind of comic books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of comic books, but I'm a big fan of superhero comics. What kind of hobbies do you have?
I love to go horseback riding, make bagels, and work out. What about you?
I love to go horseback riding too! I also like to read, play music, and work as an online tutor.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play music.
It's never too late to learn! I started taking piano lessons when I was 10 years old.
That's really cool! I've always been too shy to take lessons.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun and you can learn a lot.
I might just do that! Thanks for the advice.
No problem! I'm always happy to help
